articles.content: Asked why she isn't a part of The Great Indian Kapil Sharma Show, she told PTI: I dont have an answer to this. The show that I was part of, which was on another channel, ended last year in July. Sinc… [+288 chars]

articles.title: Rakhi Sawant's tumour surgery is successful, ex Ritesh Singh informs her fans - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Rakhi Sawant, a popular entertainer, recently underwent surgery to remove a 10 cm tumor from her uterus. Her ex-husband, Ritesh Singh, shared updates and a video of her entering the operation theater, along with an encouraging message.
